events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund issue due to receiving the incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to Agent Sarah for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your refund for the incorrect item received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 123456789 and a photo showing the item I received which is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the prompt refund processing.
The refund has been issued successfully, and the customer has been notified with the transaction details.
We are checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if you need any further assistance.
The case regarding the refund issue has been formally closed after customer confirmation.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback about the refund handling experience.
